Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Autopilot disengagement without warning. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Electronic Warfare component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 12/04/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon
